main event: A bluish white object resembling a pinpoint of light was sighted passing over East Springfield, Massachusetts.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on January 22, 1952, at approximately 5:30 AM UTC,The object was observed for about three seconds as it traveled in a flat trajectory,The object was estimated to be at an altitude of 49,203 feet,No noise was heard during the sighting and the weather was clear,Only one confirmed reliable witness was present, who was a gas station attendant.
sighted object: bluish white object appearing as a pinpoint of light
witness description: A gas station attendant and an unidentified customer
